title: Rylai 6.24 changes - who does it punish / benefit
body: Riot have indicated they didn't want "all" players to grab rylais. But im not sure who it is meant for now.

replies.body:
Punishes : (mid laners) Taliyah, Aurelion Sol, Viktor, Orianna

Helps: (supports) Zyra, Brand, Malzahar (only because its cheaper)
That contradicts rogue below. Can you elaborate at all?
the way I read rogu3s was that it is now better on champs like taliyah - you said it was worse.

It's core on mid lane Taliyah, but the nerf punishes her, yes.

Try [here](http://www.lolking.net/news/upcoming-rylais-changes-biggest-winners-and-biggest-losers) for more information.

P.S. The winners are winners because of the cost reduction, hence this is why you see zyra and malzahar as top tier supports currently in the meta.

An example, {{item:3116}}  has been core on {{champion:163}}  for a very, very long time. Even though her Q, W and E all count as AOE damage. This means that {{champion:163}}  had no way to proc the single target 40% slow.

Now that it only offers a 20% slow, for all types of spells, mages that have a lot of AOE can get the same results out of the item as mages who're more focused on single targets.

Another thing, was that back on the old {{item:3116}} , {{champion:63}}  could proc each type of slow, so you'd constantly be shifting through different movement speeds AND durations. 

You'll be seeing it on a lot more supports now, but the item is still strongest on mages that have high damage combos that are hard to land on fleeing targets.

{{champion:163}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:143}} 

However, since the changes I have noticed a few champions making use of the item that I wasn't expecting.

Hope that helps at all :)
